Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm Caornwald.

I've been playing KSP since 0.90, where I played Science mode for a while and managed to get to (and back from) both Mun and Minmus.

When 1.0 arrived I started my 1st Career mode game (Normal difficulty) and right now I have about 500k funds, satellites orbiting Kerbin and Mun, and I've successfully landed on and returned from Mun.

However, I still consider myself quite a beginner, since I've never did any docking (and not even any rescue from orbit missions) and haven't even tried any interplanetary.

I like this game a lot and look forward to learn how to do more...

P.S. English isn't my native language, sorry in advance for my mistakes.
Hello, and welcome! Check out any of the great Let's Plays over at Live from Mission Control (A sub-forum here).

Welcome aboard! Don't worry, I've been playing since like .18, and I can say for a fact that there's always more to learn. I'm still trying to figure out how to do interplanetary things, which used to be a huuuuuuge challenge for me.
